metadata.description: He's annoying. He's dangerous. He smells terrible. But the public loves him. That's right- the Merc with the Mouth may make money for missions of murky morality...but he's become the most popular hero in the world for it. Eat that, Spidey! The world belongs to Deadpool. The fan favorite team of Gerry Duggan and Mike Hawthorne return to bring Deadpool into his most successful adventures yet!
metadata.name: Deadpool
